title: Samuel’s Farewell Speech
summary: Samuel gives a farewell speech, reminding Israel of God’s faithfulness and warning them to remain faithful under their new king. He calls down thunder and rain as a sign of God’s power, leading the people to repentance.

faq.question: What was the purpose of Samuel’s speech?
faq.answer: To affirm his integrity, review Israel’s history, and warn them to obey God under the new monarchy.

faq.question: What miracle confirmed Samuel’s words?
faq.answer: God sent thunder and rain during the harvest as a sign of His displeasure.
